name: Six Day War
description:
This is a tank game in solo dev by NotApplicable, (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJiwQf6qD9UKvnjoqlUqG8Q).

This game is set in the six day war (1967).

 This game has realistic physics, shell ballistics and a good damage model. there are indivisual modules for parts eg (engine, gun, driver) and it is displayed in the bottom left.

Controls;

WASD - movement

Space - machine gun

Left Click - shoot cannon

Right Click - zoom

I - night vision
